引入套件
```{r}
library(stringr)
```

no package
```{r}
install.packages("stringr")
```

subset
```{r}
course <- c("個體經濟學","投資學","總體經濟學")
course
str_subset(course,"經濟學")
```

```{r}
course
str_detect(course,"經濟學")
```


str_sub
```{r}
studentID<-c(
  '410177115','410176080','410174233','410177011','410182045','410176014')
studentID
major<- str_sub(studentID,5,6) # 學系號
major
```
